# init(style:)

**Initializer**

Creates a blur effect with the designated style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(style: UIBlurEffect.Style)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: The intensity of the blur effect. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBlurEffect/Style] for valid options.

## Return Value

The blur effect to be used by a UIVisualEffectView object.
